### 5. optim alternatives

optimParallel

```{r}
x1 <- rnorm(10000)
w1 <- runif(10000)
x2 <- rnorm(10000000)
w2 <- runif(10000000)
cp1 <- function(x,w) crossprod(x,w)[[1]]
cp2 <- function(x,w) sum(x*w)

r1 <- mark(crossprod10K=cp1(x1,w1),
  sum10K=cp2(x1,w1)) %>%
  mutate(expression=names(expression))

r2 <-mark(
  crossprod10M=cp1(x2,w2),
  sum10M=cp2(x2,w2)) %>%
  mutate(expression=names(expression))

bind_rows(r1,r2)
```
